name: CALayoutManager
desc: Methods that allow an object to manage the layout of a layer and its sublayers.

items.name: func invalidateLayout(of: CALayer)
items.desc: Invalidates the layout of a layer so it knows to refresh its content on the next frame.

items.name: func layoutSublayers(of: CALayer)
items.desc: Override to customize layout of sublayers whenever the layer needs redrawing.
